// Problem URL : http://www.codechef.com/problems/MAXSUM/
// Problem Code : MAX SUM
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long uint64;
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
			  uint64 n;
			  scanf("%llu",&n);
			  if(n == 1){printf("0\n");continue;}
			  printf("%llu\n", ((uint64)n * n - 2) / 2);
 	}
 	
	return 0;
}
